content: Mister Heine, I appreciate the opportunity to view the apartment. As a responsible tenant, I'm looking for the lowest possible rental price while still being respectful of your property. Can you provide your proposed rental price for the 25 square meter apartment we discussed?
name: Ryanah Rahman

content:
1200 Euros per month would be a reasonable asking price for this apartment. What do you think?

Please also note that I am a landlord who is looking to maximize my gains, so I am open to negotiation. Is there any reason you would not agree to this price?

I would like us to arrange a meeting to discuss this further, as I believe it would be best to have a face-to-face conversation to finalize the agreement. Does that work for you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
